BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BISHOP JOHN R MCGANN SENIOR HOUSING

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION OWNS & OPERATES A SECTION 202 HUD MULTIFAMILY HOUSING PROJECT FOR THE ELDERLY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING FOR ELIGIBLE LOW INCOME FAMILIES AND INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.Desc: ON A NOT-FOR-PROFIT BASIS, THE CORPORATION PROVIDES 125 UNITS OF AFFORDABLE RENTAL HOUSING FOR PERSONS OF LIMITED MEANS IN CENTRAL ISLIP, NEW YORK, WHERE NO ADEQUATE HOUSING EXISTS FOR SUCH PERSONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROJECT ENTERED INTO A CONTRACT WITH AN INDEPENDENT MANAGEMENT COMPANY WHICH HANDLES THE OPERATION OF THE BUILDING, ALL BUILDING RELATED SERVICES, ALL TENANT NEEDS AND SERVICES, AS WELL AS ALL LEGAL, FINANCIAL AND OTHER MATTERS. ALL SALARIES ARE PAID THROUGH THIS INDEPENDENT MANAGEMENT COMPANY WHICH FILES ALL RELATED PAYROLL TAX RETURNS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DISTRIBUTES A DRAFT COPY OF THE IRS FORM 990 TO ITS BOARD MEMBERS TO REVIEW; WHO THEN ARE PROVIDED AN OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE COMMENTS OR INQUIRIES. APPROPRIATE RESPONSES ARE GIVEN TO THEIR SATISFACTION. THE BOARD APPROVES THE FILING OF THE FORM AT A MEETING HELD PRIOR TO ITS DUE DATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL UPDATES ARE REQUESTED IN WRITING FROM THE BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO BOARD MEMBERS OR OFFICERS RECEIVE ANY COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS,CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST ON AN AS NEEDED BASIS AS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION A, COLUMN B:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PERFORM GOVERNANCE AND OTHER SERVICES THROUGHOUT THE YEAR FOR THE HOUSING ENTITIES LISTED IN SCHEDULE R, PART II, FOR NO COMPENSATION. THE HOURS LISTED ON PAGE 7, PART VII, SECTION A, COLUMN B, ARE ESTIMATES OF THE AVERAGE WEEKLY COMBINED HOURS WORKED ON ALL OF THESE ENTITIES.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS ANNUAL BOARD MEETINGS TO REVIEW AND APPROVE THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE BOARD ALSO APPROVES THE SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
